name: digital-analytics-program
description: Provides a JavaScript file for US federal agencies to link or embed in their websites to participate in the Digital Analytics Program.

scripts.test-site-dev: docker build --no-cache --build-arg DAP_ENV='dev' -t dap-test-site-dev . && docker run --rm -p 8080:80 --name dap-test-site-dev dap-test-site-dev
scripts.test-site-stg: docker build --no-cache --build-arg DAP_ENV='stg' -t dap-test-site-stg . && docker run --rm -p 8080:80 --name dap-test-site-stg dap-test-site-stg
scripts.test-site-prd: docker build --no-cache --build-arg DAP_ENV='prd' -t dap-test-site-prd . && docker run --rm -p 8080:80 --name dap-test-site-prd dap-test-site-prd
